attributes.action: to keep the GB football team bid alive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started this petition to keep the GB football team bid alive and stop some pathetic self sentered opositionists from scraping this idea. The last time i looked i thought this country was called the United Kingdom, not England, Ireland, Scotland and Wales.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
